description.en:
One fateful day, Tsugumi Satonaka, a high school teacher, is seen possessing a certain incriminating object by the hottest guy in school, Mikiya Kamijou. She tries to keep Mikiya quiet with pleas and bribes, but ends up being tormented with lewd situations! Starting with a story of forbidden love between teacher and student, this collection's full of egotistical younger guys.

Comenzando con una historia de amor prohibido entre profesor y estudiante, esta colección está llena de chicos jóvenes ego� stas. ¡El sexo es seguro satisfacer !!
